name: sentiment_analysis
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool google_s_bert_sentiment_analysis.
Tool description: The BERT-Based Sentiment Analysis API is a cutting-edge tool that leverages Google's BERT (Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers) model to perform accurate sentiment analysis on text data. BERT is a state-of-the-art language representation model that excels in understanding context and nuances, making it highly effective for sentiment classification tasks. This API provides developers with the ability to harness the power of BERT for robust and precise sentiment analysis.
